function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Customization of occupant properties may lead to inaccurate simulation of virus spread.","Impact":"Inaccurate simulation may result in ineffective mitigation strategies and increased risk of virus transmission.","Mitigation":"Provide clear guidelines for customizing occupant properties and validate simulation results with real-world data.","Technologies":"Simulation validation tools, data analytics tools.","People":"Developers, researchers, simulation users.","Owner":"Developers, researchers, simulation users."},{"Description":"Default values for virus properties may not reflect the characteristics of a specific virus, leading to inaccurate simulation results.","Impact":"Inaccurate simulation may lead to underestimation or overestimation of virus transmission risk in the built environment.","Mitigation":"Allow users to input custom virus properties and provide guidance on obtaining accurate virus data.","Technologies":"User input interfaces, data validation tools.","People":"Developers, researchers, simulation users.","Owner":"Developers, researchers, simulation users."},{"Description":"The visualization methods may oversimplify the complexity of virus transmission in the built environment, leading to misinterpretation of simulation results.","Impact":"Misinterpretation may lead to ineffective design decisions and inadequate virus transmission mitigation strategies.","Mitigation":"Provide comprehensive training on interpreting visualization results and offer supplementary data for deeper analysis.","Technologies":"Training modules, supplementary data visualization tools.","People":"Simulation users, designers, architects.","Owner":"Developers, simulation users."}]}
